Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us due to its unique features, quality, and the benefits it offers. Considering its unparalleled nature, we're extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $11500. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
